title: 94/317/EC: Council Decision of 2 June 1994 authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7 March 1995 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 2 June 1994 authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7 March 1995 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa (94/317/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Kingdom of Spain is hereby authorized to extend until 7 March 1995 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into force on 8 March 1982.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 2 June 1994.
For the Council
The President
D. KREMASTINOS
(1) OJ No L 88, 8. 4. 1993, p. 45.
